item.title: Coca-Cola Plans to Launch Cane Sugar Coke This Fall
item.description: Coca-Cola Co. plans to launch a new Coke product for American consumers made with US cane sugar this fall. Tuesday’s announcement came less than a week after President Donald Trump said in a Truth Soc
